casebody.data:
[562 U.S. 40] COSTCO WHOLESALE CORPORATION, Petitioner v OMEGA, S. A. 562 U.S. 40, 131 S. Ct. 565,

178 L. Ed. 2d 470,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9597 [No. 08-1423] Argued November 8, 2010. Decided December 13, 2010. APPEARANCES OF COUNSEL ARGUING CASE Roy T. Englert, Jr. argued the cause for petitioner. Aaron M. Panner argued the cause for respondent. Malcolm L. Stewart argued the cause for the United States, as amicus curiae, by special leave of court. PER CURIAM.

[562 U.S. 41]

The judgment is affirmed by an equally divided Court.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
